original_text: I planted you in my land, like the very good seed of a vine. But see how you have changed! You have become like a wild vine. Your grapes are bad and useless. korean_text: 내가 너를 순전한 참 종자 곧 귀한 포도나무로 심었거늘 내게 대하여 이방 포도나무의 악한 가지가 됨은 어찌 됨이냐

sentences.original_text: I planted you in my land
like the very good seed of a vine
But see how you have changed
You have become like a wild vine
